text: Va on ci az mol jo ƣajri on, kam jo ʙisjor doda şuded va onro ʙaroi rizoijati Alloh nafaqa kuned va jo nazrero, ki ʙa gardan ʙigired, Alloh onro medonad va ʙinoʙar nijathojaton ʙa şumo savoʙ medihad va kase, ki haqqi Allohro man' mekunad, vaj sitamkor ast va sitamkoronro madadgore nest, ki az azoʙi Alloh onhoro xalos gardonand
